author: cms-tsg-storm
body:
#### PR description:

This PR removes the frozen HLT menu "2022 v1.5" from the `master` branch of CMSSW (currently, `CMSSW_13_1_X`).

This menu is unused in this branch, and in general there is usually no need for frozen menus in the `master` branch. Keeping said frozen menus in this branch only means extra work to maintain them in `ConfDB` ('migrating' them to newer release 'templates', or modifying them to comply with technical changes in CMSSW, e.g. https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/40215).

#### PR validation:

None.

#### If this PR is a backport, please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported, please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

N/A
title: remove HLT frozen menu `"2022v15"` from `13_1_X` branch
